predicate.note: Frames file for 'poke' based on sentences in wsj. Verbnet entries 19 and 35.5.

example.name: oddly inverted
example.text: [*] VISUALIZING BLOOD vessels without [*] poking catheters into the body may come out of research at AT&T Bell Laboratories.

example.name: maybe a different roleset
example.text: Another poked a hole in the heel of his shoe .
example.arg: in the heel of his shoe

example.name: almost argumentless
example.text: Mr. Baker hears her out, pokes around a bit, asks a few questions and proposes some explanations.

example.name: all args
example.text: John poked around in Mary's lingerie drawer for a can opener.
